TextLibrary.Text: You know that frequency you have constantly had me checking for weeks now.
You know that frequency you have constantly had me checking for weeks now.
Technically, no. Since it was a radio frequency and not an audible sound wave, I DETECTED something but I HEARD nothing.
Technically, no. Since it was a radio frequency and not an audible sound wave, I DETECTED something but I HEARD nothing.
Weeks of depleting my batteries checking for the same frequency, Lydia; this small amount of sarcasm is the only real thing that tests my circuits.
Weeks of depleting my batteries checking for the same frequency, Lydia; this small amount of sarcasm is the only real thing that tests my circuits.
Can it, and tell me what you DETECTED.
Can it, and tell me what you DETECTED.
A faint echo of a distress beacon. It seems to be two systems away at Lacerta Omega.
A faint echo of a distress beacon. It seems to be two systems away at Lacerta Omega.
